page.title: 16CROSS COUNTRY RUNNING
page.content:
The Belton district and its surrounding lanes are especially attractive to local runners. Most road and cross country athletes in the district will train or race over the varied terrain.
In the lankscaped park the soft grassland, attractine tree lined hills and real country atmosphere make it possible for the athlete to get right away from the urban sprawl.
Around the Park the old drove roads, once 4 gated to keep in animals, are now throughways and tarmacadammed and they too take the road runner to splendid view-points.
A number of local races have been and are still being staged in the area. The Belton Park cross countuy events
